entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
